special_result_for_divider
Summary

Generates the results for the special cases of the division.

Parameters
M

Mantissa width.

E

Exponent width.

special_case

Number of supported special cases (including non-special case).

Ports
X

First operand (in custom floating-point format).

Y

Second operand (in custom floating-point format).

X_special_case

Encoded identifier of the special case for operand X (0 = not special).

Y_special_case

Encoded identifier of the special case for operand Y (0 = not special).

special_result

Result of the special case (in custom floating-point format).

Variables
RES_SIGN
logic RES_SIGN

Sign bit of the result.

Special case identifiers

Constant encoding of recognized special cases.

Constants
CASE_NONE

No special case.

CASE_INF_P

Positive infinity.

CASE_INF_N

Negative infinity.

CASE_ZERO_P

Positive zero.

CASE_ZERO_N

Negative zero.

CASE_ONE_P

Positive one.

CASE_ONE_N

Negative one.

INF

Constant representing infinity.

ZERO

Constant representing zero.
